patthana15.64:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.64:0.3_0: this is the extent of their eyes.
patthana15.64:1.1_1: Never what is skillful and unskillful, blameworthy for oneself and what is a reason.
patthana15.64:1.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
patthana15.64:2.1_0: Not reciting the unskillful teaching, they don’t give rise to the spheres of the unskillful.
patthana15.64:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
patthana15.64:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
